COMMENT_TX: $Yankee Stadium PA announcer Bob Shepard not working for the first opener since 1950; had injured his hip the previous day
Royals DH Mike Sweeney left the game due to an injured hand/wrist
Yankees right fielder Gary Sheffield left the game due to an injured knee Blue Jays first baseman Shea Hillenbrand left the game due to an injured head
fan interference
ej,torrj101,M,dowda901,Balls and strikes Yankees Manager Joe Torre ejected by HP umpire Adam Dowdy
ej,gibbj001,M,dowda901,Balls and strikes Blue Jays Manager John Gibbons ejected by HP umpire Adam Dowdy
ej,willb002,P,relic901,Called third strike Yankees DH Bernie Williams ejected by HP umpire Charlie Reliford
Matsui left with a broken left wrist
Yankees right fielder Bubba Crosby left the game due to an injured leg
fan interference
$infield fly caught by outfielder
$Derek Jeter buzzed by a high and tight pitch
$Jorge Posada and Jason Johnson exchange words; both sides warned

ej,johnr005,P,schrp901,Intentionally throwing at batter ej,torrj101,M,schrp901,Intentionally throwing at batter $Yankees pitcher Randy Johnson & Mgr Joe Torre ejected by HP  umpire Paul Schrieber for throwing at Eduardo Perez, who pointed  his bat at Johnson and took a few steps toward the mound
Indians left fielder Jason Michaels left the game due to an injured foot/ankle
Yankees second baseman Robinson Cano left the game due to an injured leg
ej,cox-b103,M,wendh902,Balls and strikes Braves Manager Bobby Cox ejected by HP umpire Hunter Wendelstedt
originally scored as S5, changed next day
Mets pitcher Steve Trachsel left the game due to an injured groin
ej,hargm001,M,reilm901,Call at 1B $disputed call at 1B; replay showed Posada out; Mariners Manager Mike Hargrove ejected by 1B umpire Mike Reilly
Devil Rays Ty Wigginton left the game due to a broken hand
$catcher Rene Rivera turned and argued the call with HP umpire Mike Reilly while holding the ball; Andy Phillips ran to 3B but 3B umpire Andy Fletcher called time and sent Phillips back to 2B
Orioles third baseman Melvin Mora left the game due to an injured hand/wrist
ej,leylj801,M,hoyej901,Balls and strikes Tigers Manager Jim Leyland ejected by HP umpire James Hoye for arguing balls and strikes
$Leyland came onto field to talk with Hoye but had to stand at attention for the playing of 'God Bless America'
Game called for rain
Devil Rays pitcher James Shields left the game due to an injured leg
$Posada was hit in left elbow while trying to check swing. Replaced by Cabrera who completed strikeout, charged to Posada.
Orioles pitcher Hayden Penn left the game due to an injured back
ej,perls101,M,davib902,Checked swing $Orioles Manager Sam Perlozzo ejected by 1B umpire Bob Davidson for arguing half-swing call on Tejada
